Html: Hello, I have one question. Is it the way to get distance of one point from some track? I have reference track and I need this distance - deviation of point from this track. And I need it in meters, so there is problem with translate degrees to meters on Earth.. I need high precission of deviation - deviations are maximally meters. Thanks for reply
that function is implemented in providers projection already
Radioman: Great, it is exactly what i need :-) Many thanks

Hello, I have one more question about this. How much is this method exactly? Haversine calculate distance on sphere (I think) but Earth is defined as ellipsoid by WGS-84. GPS is using WGS-84, Google Maps is using WGS-84..I am using it too.. but is this calculation of distance right? Thanks for explanation.
And one more question. Is the code of method GetDistance from Map Providers available somewhere here? Thanks
GetDistance is implemented in provider projection base class
